Posted By: EnderofGames (4/25/2012 12:46:48 PM)

@LightningWombat

Untap -> Upkeep -> Draw

This ability triggers during the upkeep step, so if your opponent has no hand and can manage to play what they draw each turn, that's only 1 damage each turn. Speaking from experience, there is nothing more frustrating than a handless opponent when you're trying to run them down with a megrim.

posts.post_content: This is almost the same as [Necrogen Mists](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Necrogen Mists) except for two very big differences. 1) This is double black while the Mist is a single black. 2) This is random whereas Mists is not. I guess you could still build a decent madness/threshold/recur deck out of this compared to Mists, but the whole random thing to you is probably not ideal.

posts.post_content: Actually, if you'd fall in Bottomless pit, you wouldnt die of thirst, since few hours of flying at maximum speed that air resistance allows you would be moving so fast, it would dry out the skin and continue to dry out your body untill there is nothing left of you... and while im typing this, I realized this is exactly what 'death of thirst' actually is :D Im smart as hell xD

posts.post_content:
The only problem is that if you’re just looking for the usual discard effect, there’s plenty to choose from that would only cause your opponent to discard. However, if you need to discard as well then it’s a neat extra perk to toy with opponent’s hand in the process. 3 casting cost keeps it realistic to work on some ideas that can capitalize off the play.  
Comments are awesome, I truly lol, and it certainly does remind me of that Starwars scene.
